values:
Hello :) 
 wow its been nearly a year sine i posted last. so long that it tock me ages to remember how :S. time just seem to go so fast lately.  

 anyways things are good, i have a website now thanks to microphonemark and darkpsychosis, its www.hippylizard.com. 

 i know this is a bit late but congrats to sandy and sam hope you are all well :)

YEY  we got a dog :OD if anyone didn't know.  so i just wanted to say : 
 
 DOG DOG DOG DOG DOG........................:OD
   
   we got him from the RSPCA he's a two year old colly cross, and very well behaved. 
  we called him jack. 

    i would post a pic but i haven't worked out how to yet.

i wish i could pick up all my friends and family, and move them to somewhere nice, with lots of land. away from all the horrible people. 

   or maybe we could put all the horrible people on a island somewhere were they can't leave.

i had a grate running jumping climbing trees, and been very silly weekend which was much fun :o) 
 
  but then on sunday night i got some very bad news, and now i just feel like curling up in a corner somewhere and hiding :O( but i guess life mush go on.

The terrible twosome Zeno and Keko (my two cockatiels) have blown the electrics this morning but not just once, four times! they have been landing on the light fitting and chewing there way through the wire. i kept chasing them and telling them off but as soon as i left the room the did it again, so now they are sulking in the other room, and i had to tape the wire back together.
  i'm glad we have some new lights to go up :o)

WOW i'm going to get payed for doing something fun, it feels so wrong.
   
   ive been asked to spend a day or two painting lewis's room in egyptian stlye :0) i've already got lots off ideas, i'm really looking forward to it.

look i'm not dead! i really should post more but i never know what to say?...........

 i'm less addicted to WOW now, which i think is a good thing, and i just sent a cv off today with some of
  my fabric samples, to see if i can get some more workshops :O) so fingers crossed.

Your Hair Should Be Orange
Expressive, deep, and one of a kind. You pull off "weird" well - hardly anyone notices.
What's Your Funky Inner Hair Color?

Your Brain's Pattern
Your mind is a multi dimensional wonderland, with many layers. You're the type that always has multiple streams of though going. And you can keep these thoughts going at any time. You're very likely to be engaged in deep thought - and deep conversation.
What Pattern Is Your Brain?

Gummy Bears
You may be smooshie and taste unnatural, but you're so darn cute.
What Kind of Candy Are You?

Your Heart Is Orange
Love equals unbridled happiness for you. You enjoy the wild ride of falling in love. And while the ride is fun for a while, you always get off once the thrill is gone. Your flirting style: Hyper Your lucky first date: Anything you need your passport for! Your dream lover: Is both daring and well grounded What you bring to relationships: Energy
What Color Heart Do You Have?

HELLO....... :o) Just had to say i had a brill weekend last week :O) 
       we went to the sheffield reenactment fair to demonstrate sword fighting to the public, it was tiyering and i have some good broses, but it was all good fun :O) i carnt wait to do it all again.

la la la, no more working at morrisons for me :OP 
   
     la la la poop!

I thought it would be easier to post what my bussness is, as your all asking the same question. 

Thankyou everbody for the good luck :o) 

I make bags, Soft furnishings and eventually costums (only some old style shrits at the mo).

I have some bags in a shop at Bishop Auckland, its called dreamweaver, there's a shop in Alston that is intrested, I've done a set of cushions for the council and i've started to get lots of orders from people :o) yey 

Also, someones asked me to run a craft workshop. yey again :o)

yey new job for me :O) 
 i when to a interview yesterday, for a new job and i got it yey. its nothing very exciting its working at the co op in tow law. its less hours and much closer to home, the same street infact. so no more hour long bus journeys. this also means more time at home to set up my business :o) which im starting to get more orders for. at last my working life is picking up. :O)

i been leaning how to use the internet again today :o) its been fun but still stock on some bits but i don't think i could do them before anyway, its all good fun really.

  ive come to the conclusion i need to take more pics. :o)

:o)

(arrrrrrrr andy keeps taking over i dont know what im doing anymore) anyway as i was saying YEY internet for me la la la :o) im back :o) internet for me la la la :o) internet for me la la la :o) This is just a quick note to say hello :o) to everyone I havn't seen for ages. I'm not dead.

Eventually <lj user=darkpsychosis> will get us internet and I can talk to people more often.

wow, i never thaught i would miss the internet but for some reasson it seem to have got some funny hold on me too. eep .
 i've traveled for tree hours no a bus to my mams today and she has internt :o) but i still carnt fined any goth fest pic's
:0( doh hopefully we will have net soon x

to anyone who didnt know im getting a chincilla :o)
 of one of my friends breads them. anyway  
 they were born last saterday and they are soooo
 cut and tiny. you can see them on: www.chillas.co.uk/frameset.html

 also YEY whitby soon :o)

i whant to put my noteise in at work, but i need the money, doh! and it wouldnt be fair to fined another job just befor we about to move away.  :o( 

oh well i supose i dont have to wait to long befor i can leave :o)

My inner child is ten years old!

The adult world is pretty irrelevant to me. Whether
I'm off on my bicycle (or pony) exploring, lost
in a good book, or giggling with my best
friend, I live in a world apart, one full of
adventure and wonder and other stuff adults
don't understand.

 im going to miss her so so much,

 I LOVE YOU JESS.

my brid jess is very icky i've been to the vets and they said she has a kideny infection, :o( i have to take her to the vets agian at 5.
 
i dont know what else to do apart from whach her sleep in my arms.

also a big thankyou to serha and inncubus for all there help.

im fed up of painting chssey pictures for my family, and my famliys friends! i mean theres only so meany pictures of ducks, swans, buildings, bridges, and dam still lives one person can do at one time without going crazzy. (but not even cazzy in a good way, dam it) on the up side they do pay something for them and i kina need the money.

oh to paint something interesting and for me for a change but i dont have time to do that as well, because them little time steeling pixies keep running away with it.

i guess im just being selfish sorry.

I amHastur!

The Unspeakable One is the master of those who seek to unveil the mysteries of death. It is through meditation upon the Yellow Sign that the devotee of Hastur seeks transcendence to the city-realm of dim Carcosa. Through a complex series of visualizations that expand the aspirants void-consciousness, the final age will arise. Ruled by the ominous King in Yellow, a new stage of reality will come to fruition. Of the Olde Ones, Hastur is considered to be one of the most difficult to work with, his teachings being reserved exclusively for the Cthonian Adepts and Lords.
Which Great Old One are you?
